testcase.title: Check that the response returns the error message for invalid entries.

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "SOAP" API
I pass a "query = biomarkerUseId::1 and querylanguage = ssql and hits = 100 and offset = 0 and sortBy = biomarkerName and filtersEnabled = 1" as parameter to "getBiomarkerUseResults" operation
I should retrieve a response with following "Error consuming internal services: biomarkerUseId does not support ID based search."

testcase.title: Check that the response returns the error message for invalid entries.

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "SOAP" API
I pass a "query = Cancer and querylanguage = ssql and hits = 100 and offset = 0 and sortBy = bikl and filtersEnabled = 0" as parameter to "getBiomarkerUseResults" operation
I should retrieve a response with following "Error consuming internal services: Invalid sort requested."

testcase.title: Check that the response returns the error message for invalid entries.

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "SOAP" API
I pass a "query = a%20OR%20NOT%20a and querylanguage = ssql and hits = 100 and offset = 0 and sortBy = biomarkerName and filtersEnabled = 7" as parameter to "getBiomarkerUseResults" operation
I should retrieve a response with following "Error processing API service: FiltersEnabled should be 1/0, true/false"
